This is the oldest CD I own. #USER# "New Adventures In Hi-Fi" 1996, bought it the day in was released. Used it as a master to create MP3s, then WMAs, then AACs on my phone as I commuted. It's condition is perfect to this day, and has survived three new "CD killer" formats. #URL#

#USER# It got so stupid, discs were being sold with a little "Playstation 2 compatible" patches on the back of the cover. PR masturbation for sure...but having "compatible" discs implied there were discs that werent...so store staff got so over dumb customers asking🤣 #URL#
